column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The waitress was so slow and rude. I kept asking for our waitress
column3: did not apologize for being late. The food took too long
column5: sat after us and were served before us
column6: The service and food taste were below average
column8: Chicago has plenty of other nice places to have breakfast at. This place is not one of them. They are so overrated.
